p: Recently, a VLP preparation consisting of retroviral Gag-VLPs pseudo-typed with the HA was expressed using the novel Trichoplusia ni ( T.ni)-derived insect cell line Tnms42 and tested successfully to assess the sole contribution of anti-HA immunity in limiting post-influenza secondary Staphylococcus aureus bacterial infection, morbidity and mortality in a situation of a vaccine match and mismatch [ 87]. The results demonstrate that matched anti-HA immunity elicited by a VLP preparation may suffice to prevent morbidity and mortality caused by lethal secondary bacterial infection.
